emuInput.TitMainTitle: Westinghouse Junior High School students and staff, including Louis Mazzatti, Nancy Shoemaker, Jewel Taylor, Yvonne Blyshak, Mamie Stewart, Rose Tibbets, Shirley Montgomery, and Floyd Hopewell, gathered around boxes of food for Aged Ministers and Laymen's Home
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1958, page A8, reads: "From Westinghouse - Mrs. Mamie Stewart (center), superintendent of the Aged Ministers and Laymen's Home, receives a gift of food from (left to right) Louis Mazzatti, Nancy Shoemaker, Jewel Taylor, Mrs. Yvonne Blyshak, a junior counsellor; Rose Tibbets, Shirley Montgomery and Floyd Hopewell, in behalf of the students of Westinghouse Junior High School and the Student Council. The gift was 32 boxes of canned foods and groceries. - Harris Photo."
